attributes.action: Stop insurance companies charging admin charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Insurance companies are charging more and more, and now they are chairing admin fees if you move house or change vehicles even though if you change to a bigger car they charge you more and then put on an admin fee this is unreasonable and unacceptable. They don’t charge you an admin fee for taking the policy out so should not charge you an admin fee for updating information
